name: KAIMA Bad Ending Gaiden
description:
SPOILER WARNING: As you may have guessed, KAIMA Bad Ending Gaiden is based on the bad ending of KAIMA by NomnomNami.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys/WASD - move
  • X/Enter - attack adjacent enemy
  • R - restart level

I wrote the song used in this game months ago as a hypothetical boss theme for Searina, and I figured I should finally put it to use. You can listen to it on YouTube or SoundCloud. If you enjoy music like this, check out my Bandcamp, which includes KAIMA's official soundtrack!

To make this game, I used PuzzleScript and modified some of the exported HTML.
